32 //class for Republishing
33 class ImageConverter
34 {
35  ros::NodeHandle nh_;
36  image_transport::ImageTransport it_;
37  image_transport::Subscriber image_sub_;
38  image_transport::Publisher image_pub_;
39 
40 public:
41  ImageConverter()
42  : it_(nh_)
43  {
44  //Subscribing to input image_topic and publishing to output image_topic//
45  image_sub_ = it_.subscribe("/miro/rob01/platform/caml", 1,
46  &ImageConverter::imageCb, this);
47  image_pub_ = it_.advertise("/miro_scaledimage/left/image_raw", 1);
48 
49  /*cv::namedWindow(OPENCV_WINDOW);*/
50  }

54  /*cv::destroyWindow(OPENCV_WINDOW);*/

56 
57  void imageCb(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg)
58  {
59  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr;
60  try
61  {
62  cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(msg, sensor_msgs::image_encodings::BGR8);
63  }
64  catch (cv_bridge::Exception& e)
65  {
66  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s", e.what());
67  return;
68  }
69 
70 
71  cv_ptr->image=cv_ptr->image(cv::Range(0,cv_ptr->image.rows),cv::Range(180,320));
72 
73  /*// Update GUI Window*/
74  /* cv::imshow(OPENCV_WINDOW, cv_ptr->image);*/
75  /*cv::waitKey(3);*/
76 
77  // Modified image to output_topic//
78  image_pub_.publish(cv_ptr->toImageMsg());
79  }
80 };
81 
82 int main(int argc, char** argv)
83 {
84  ros::init(argc, argv, "scaleimage_left");
85  ImageConverter ic;
86  ros::spin();
87  return 0;
88 }
